items.title: Groeibriljant Fernandez bewondert leermeester Veerman: 'Dat is echt knap'
items.summary: Noah Fernandez kreeg van Peter Bosz de kans in de basis voor het gewonnen Eurojackpot KNVB Bekerduel met FC Den Bosch ( 1-4 ) en maakte een goede indruk. Wel weet hij dat hij met Joey Veerman stevige concurrentie heeft, hoewel hij veel leert van de ervaren middenvelder.

items.title: Bosz toch kritisch na zege in Den Bosch: 'Ze luisteren niet naar me'
items.summary: PSV-trainer Peter Bosz was woensdagavond tevreden over het spel van zijn ploeg, maar hij had ook wat aan te merken op de instelling in de tweede helft. Op bezoek bij FC Den Bosch startte de topclub vooral uitstekend en daardoor werd ook de kwartfinale van de Eurojackpot KNVB Beker behaald .

items.title: Wintertransfers Eredivisie seizoen 2025/26: alle clubs op een rij
items.summary: De transferperiode is weer losgebarsten. In dit overzicht van VI vind je alle afgeronde, door clubs bevestigde, wintertransfers van de achttien Eredivisie-clubs. Clubs in Nederland kunnen tot en met 2 februari spelers aantrekken .

items.title: Fortuna Sittard verkoopt Fosso aan Sturm Graz
items.summary: Ryan Fosso heeft zijn transfer naar Sturm Graz te pakken. Fortuna Sittard onderhandelde met de Oostenrijkse topclub over een transfer van de 23-jarige middenvelder, die zondag het uitduel met Go Ahead Eagles aan zich voorbij liet gaan. Fosso tekent een meerjarig contract, volgens media in Oostenrijk tot medio 2028.

items.title: Chelsea v Arsenal: Carabao Cup semi-final first leg ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Updates from Stamford Bridge; kick-off 8pm GMT ‚öΩ Live scores | Follow us on Bluesky | Read Football Daily Liam Rosenior‚Äôs pre-match thoughts I‚Äôve been lucky enough to be with the lads for six days now. We‚Äôve been very strong on what expect as a staff, what we expect as a group, and I hope to see that come out. [On the various injuries] Reece James took a knock on his hip and he‚Äôs not quite ready. Cole [Palmer] should he available for Saturday, Liam [Delap] and Jamie Gittens are ill, Malo [Gusto] will hopefully be fit for Saturday. [On the relevance of last year‚Äôs semi-final defeats to Newcastle and PSG] There are a lot of learnings from that journey. Every competition is different. Today we are in a different place to where we were a year ago. We are away from home; last year we started at home. We‚Äôre very excited, very motivated and willing to start again. [On coming up against Liam Rosenior] Every manager has his fingerprints. The players remain the same and they will have certain habits and qualities that they want to exploit on the pitch. They are a very strong team who we respect. Continue reading...

items.title: Nigeria v Morocco: Africa Cup of Nations semi-final ‚Äì live

Captains Hakimi and Osimhen exchange pennants and handshakes. It‚Äôs go time. The noise is something else. Nigeria‚Äôs national anthem is well observed. Morocco‚Äôs is raucous ‚Äì the stakes are huge. Kick-off is upon us. Continue reading...

items.title: NWSLPA: 'Rodman rule' violates CBA, federal law
items.summary: The NWSL Players Association has filed a grievance against the league arguing that the NWSL's creation of the new "High Impact Player" mechanism violates the CBA terms.

items.title: Monaco CEO on injured Pogba: Plan isn't working
items.summary: Monaco's CEO acknowledged that their original plan for Paul Pogba "is not working," with the former France star limited to just 30 minutes of action since joining the club last summer.

items.title: Mane leads Senegal past Egypt, Salah at AFCON
items.summary: Senegal striker Sadio Mane came out on top against former Liverpool teammate Mohamed Salah on Wednesday, as Mane's decisive strike saw his team win their Africa Cup of Nations semifinal against Egypt 1-0 in Tangier.

items.title: Richards named U.S. Male Player of the Year
items.summary: Crystal Palace and United States defender Chris Richards has been voted the 2025 U.S. Soccer Male Player of the Year, the federation announced Wednesday.

items.title: Delay in disallowed Semenyo goal an 'edge case'
items.summary: The delay in ruling out a Manchester City goal for offside in Tuesday's Carabao Cup win at Newcastle was extended because semi-automated offside technology could not be used in the incident.

items.title: Taylor banned from darts for six months after failed drugs test
items.summary: Dom Taylor has been banned from darts for six months by the Darts Regulation Authority (DRA) after testing positive for cocaine and cannabis at the World Darts Championship.

items.title: VI Live: AZ slaat heel vroeg toe tegen Ajax
items.summary: In de Eurojackpot KNVB Beker staan AZ en Ajax om 21.00 uur tegenover elkaar. In het buitenland staan onder meer Chelsea - Arsenal, FC Porto - Benfica en wedstrijden van Real Madrid, Bayern M√ºnchen en Internazionale op het programma. Marokko en Nigeria vechten uit wie het tegen Senegal opneemt in de finale van de Afrika Cup.

items.title: Sadio Man√© strikes to deny Salah‚Äôs Egypt and send Senegal to Afcon final
items.summary: Some day, perhaps, Mohamed Salah will get the better of Sadio Man√© in a major game, but not on Wednesday, not in the Africa Cup of Nations semi-final. When Senegal beat Egypt in a shootout in the 2021 Afcon final, Man√© scored the winning penalty before Salah had the chance to take his. In the shootout in the qualifying playoff for the 2022 World Cup, Salah missed his effort and Man√© scored the winning penalty. This time it didn‚Äôt get to penalties, but Man√© was still the matchwinner, thrashing in the only goal with 12 minutes remaining. Semi-finals, notoriously, are not for the playing but the winning, but this was among the worst of its type. There were fouls, there was grappling, there was time-wasting, there was the feigning of injury, there were countless attempts to influence the referee, there were numerous explosions of faux outrage, there was a lot of sideways passing, and there was very little in terms of imagination or flair or quality. As a spectacle it was awful; as an occasion it held the attention only because the stakes were so high. Continue reading...

items.title: Conor Gallagher vows to bring Tottenham ‚Äòspecial moments‚Äô after ¬£34.6m transfer
items.summary: Midfielder signs long-term deal after move from Atl√©tico Thomas Frank: ‚ÄòConor will bring leadership and maturity‚Äô Conor Gallagher has pledged to bring ‚Äúspecial moments‚Äù to Tottenham after completing a ¬£34.6m transfer from Atl√©tico Madrid. The London club moved quickly for a midfielder they have long admired after losing Rodrigo Bentancur to a hamstring injury at Bournemouth last Wednesday, beating off competition from Aston Villa. Bentancur has since undergone surgery. Spurs looked at Gallagher at the end of the 2023-24 season only for him to go from Chelsea to Atl√©tico for ¬£34m. Before the Premier League game between Chelsea and Spurs in May 2024 at Stamford Bridge, the home support unfurled a giant banner of Gallagher. ‚ÄúChelsea since birth,‚Äù read the caption about their academy product. The subtext was clear: do not sell him to Spurs. Continue reading...

items.title: 'If Flick hadn't come, I would have left Barca' - Raphinha
items.summary: Raphinha has become one of Barcelona's most dependable performers and a decisive figure in their biggest matches, which he credits Hansi Flick for.

items.title: Littler vs Lim headlines first round of Bahrain Darts Masters
items.summary: Luke Littler, Gian Van Veen and Luke Humphries have been handed their first round matches in this year's Bahrain Darts Masters, in the first event of the 2026 World Series of Darts.

items.title: Is Wenger's daylight idea the solution to fix offside?
items.summary: Is the offside law about to change to Arsene Wenger's daylight idea? And should football make that change just because of VAR?

items.title: Tottenham sign Gallagher from Atletico for ¬£35m
items.summary: The former Chelsea midfielder joins Spurs on a deal until 2031.

items.title: Gallagher joins Spurs
items.summary: Tottenham have completed the signing of England midfielder Conor Gallagher from Atletico Madrid for a fee of ¬£34m.
